title: About summer courses
content: Can anyone tell me how I apply for this ?  The first slot has already started so I'd like to know when slot 2 starts. And when did they even send out the form for slot 1 ? Sort of tensed here since I'd be short on two credits if I don't pick one up

comments.body:
We had a google form sent over to decide and enter the courses we'd like to take up this summer.  
You can still register for the courses in upcoming slots. You've to write a letter to your summer courses coordinator mentioning the course and slot you'd like to enroll for.
do I have to pay for the credits too ?

According to recent credit distribution, you have to earn 6 credits through special topic courses taken either during regular semesters or summer. You do not have to pay to complete those 6 credits. You have to pay if you are doing course beyond 6 credits. They charge Rs.2500/- per credit
